channel.title: ~ ToragRevolution T|.r v0.1 ~ [Cleaned WinterLove Server - 317]: Scratch Source
channel.description:
[ul][b]Note:[/b] Don't forget to post suggestions, or glitches you find - also try and keep this thread active [pre]Attachment Included: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=320424.0;attach=15114]Manual for downloading things[/url][/pre][hr][b][img]http://img03.picoodle.com/img/img03/3/10/29/f_1m_5c8adb6.png[/img][/b] [i]Version: [/i][b]0.1[/b][hr]
[b]Download Link:[/b] [u]http://files.filefront.com/ToragRevolutionrar/;12362637;/fileinfo.html[/u] [b]Second Link:[/b] [u]http://rapidshare.com/files/164138025/ToragRevolution.rar.html[/u]
[b]FEATURES[/b]
[*][list]Working following[/list] [*][list]Switch Statements in Npchandler[/list] [*][list]More emotes[/list] [*][list]Redone first click, etc[/list] [*][list]Anti Flood[/list] [*][list]Extremely clean[/list] [*][list]Completely new packet 53[/list] [*][list]New Emote Methods[/list] [*][list]No Lag[/list] [*][list]Most Skills[/list] [*][list]Packaged[/list] [*][list]Event Manager[/list] [*][list]Action Throttle Manager[/list] [*][list]No Thread per Client[/list] [*][list]ID List[/list] [*][list]Ability to hold 377 Cache[/list] [*][list]Comes with extras[/list] [*][list]New Methods[/list] [*][list]Easy teleport ways[/list] [*][list]Added working thieving shop[/list] [*][list]New method for gem crafting[/list] [*][list]New method for fletching[/list] [*][list]New method for item On item[/list] [*][list]New dialogue method[/list] [*][list]Full Emotes[/list] [*][list]Full Eating[/list][/ul]
[ul][/ul]
[b]NOT MUCH?[/b]
I really released this to get you guys a feel of my progress. I've cleaned out many things, and added some too. You will see there is more switch statements, array's, methods and proper java conventions. I've also cleaned out the command section, so you can redo them yourself - or wait until the next version. I can promise you that this server is very clean, and very lag free. Just check out the features!
[b]HOW TO RUN![/b]
There isn't any file in the folder to basically run it, so you will need a program. If you view the read me text file, you will see a download page to download it. It comes with a crack, and once you've done that, follow these pictures:
Click the green arrow on the top of your screen.
[img]http://img37.picoodle.com/img/img37/3/11/15/f_m_b96a521.png[/img]
Then click run.
[img]http://img34.picoodle.com/img/img34/3/11/15/f_1m_f6346a8.png[/img]
Leave the program on, and then go on Moparscape's client or what ever and go on.
[b]PICTURES:[/b]
[b][img]http://img33.picoodle.com/img/img33/3/10/29/f_m_4131bf3.png[/img][/b]
[b][img]http://img33.picoodle.com/img/img33/3/10/29/f_1m_b58373f.png[/img][/b]
[i]Some pictures within a file:[/i] http://img33.picoodle.com/img/img33/3/11/15/f_m_c5eabd5.png http://img34.picoodle.com/img/img34/3/11/15/f_m_113de87.png http://img33.picoodle.com/img/img33/3/11/15/f_m_c249846.png http://img29.picoodle.com/img/img29/3/11/15/f_m_775621e.png
[b]HOW TO COMPILE:[/b]
To compile, follow these pictures below. First, right click and you will see a list of options. Click the one that is highlighted red.
[img]http://img33.picoodle.com/img/img33/3/11/15/f_m_628a456.png[/img]
[b]SOME MORE INFORMATION:[/b]
For those who are looking for a semi scratch source, then here is your deal. Although, it does require you to have a bit more skills then the average noob, this server with a bit of tender loving care can turn into a unique, and reliable source. I'll probably be releasing more versions, but this is just a start. Good luck with the future!
[b]WORK ON IT![/b]
You guys can work on it even know its the first version. I'm sure you may have to redo some things, but hey - you can release a new one, just don't put ToragRevolution, but something else. I want this server to be fully customizable and easy to work with.
[b]DOWNLOAD LINK:[/b] You can download it here: [u]http://files.filefront.com/ToragRevolutionrar/;12362637;/fileinfo.html[/u] You can download it here also: [u]http://rapidshare.com/files/164138025/ToragRevolution.rar.html[/u]
Don't forget, I've attached a notepad document about how to download the things needed, since some people may not have gotten what to do. [hr] [size=6pt]Also included with this download: ID's, HWPT v1, Item Recolor Gen v5 Credits: Roger, Graham, Mrs Extro, Daniel ~ T|.r[/size]
